title: Revlon Stainless Steel Blackhead Remover
description: Stainless Steel Blackhead RemoverGently clears clogged poresMay be used on whiteheads and blackheadsHelps keep your complexion clear and blemish-free. Small loop removes blackheads; larger loop removes whiteheads. Safe and gentle on the skin.How to use:Cleanse face thoroughly with warm water.Place loop opening over clogged pore and press down. If clog does not release easily, do not keep trying.Cleanse the affected area again.Thoroughly wash and rinse Blackhead Remover with warm water after each use.TIPS:• Apply warm water to help extraction process.• Lay tool against skin and gentle press down to extract.

title: Remington S5500 Digital Anti Static 1 Inch Ceramic Hair Straightener
description: Say goodbye to frizz and fly-aways while boosting style control with remingtons s-5500 one inch digital heat ceramic flat iron. infused anti-static technology reduces the amount of negatively charged particles during styling and allows for 50% more static control. the thirty second instant heat up will reach the salon high heat temperature of 410 degrees fahrenheit. one hour automatic shut off, 2 limited year warranty, and floating plates.

title: 8 Italia eyeliner pencils Set 1
description:
These 8 eyeliner pencils will last for a long time.
In this set: Black, Light Brown, Gold, Royal Blue, Sky Blue, Green, Lavender, Rosa.

title: Maybelline New York Dream Nude Airfoam Foundation, Classic Ivory, 1.6 Ounce
description: Introducing Maybelline's most lightweight foundation on earth, for 100% nude perfection. The weightless wonder of foam revolutionizes foundation. Dream nude airfoam's ultra-refined pigments are lightly dispersed in air to create a nude perfect finish with a lightweight feel. SPF 16 helps protect skin from future sun damage.
